segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment for unique identification of the message type, its function, and the reference number for the response.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the relevant dates and times associated with the response. The segment must be specified at least once to specify the processing date of the response message.

segment.name: Application error information
segment.documentation: ERC, A segment identifying the type of application errors within the message to which CASRES is a response.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying the jurisdiction and court or tribunal locations associated with the response message.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a particular reference associated with the response when required, e.g. reference number for a legal case.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount involved in the dispute.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation:
FTX, A segment for free text information in coded or clear form, to give further clarification to the response message, e.g. the type of complaint, the nature of complaint.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying the particulars of a party to a dispute.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the name and address of a party.

segment.name: Sequence details
segment.documentation: SEQ, A segment to provide for the allocation of a sequence number (referenced in the GIR of Segment group 2) to a party involved in a dispute.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment for free text information in coded or clear form, to give further clarification when required of a party, e.g. 'trading as' and other legal descriptions.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the particular details applicable to a court or tribunal order.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment to provide relevant descriptive information relating to a court or tribunal order (certificate).

segment.name: Related identification numbers
segment.documentation: GIR, A segment to identify a group of parties (via the sequence numbers allocated in Segment group 1) related to an order, e.g. all the parties that the order is on behalf of, or all the parties to which the order applies.

segment.name: Payment terms
segment.documentation: PYT, A segment identifying the terms of payment, e.g. by instalment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the relevant date, time or period associated with the order, e.g. date order made, instalment periods.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount involved in the order.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment for free text information in coded or clear form, to give further clarification when required to a court or tribunal order.
